attributes.action: would the government of today please allow us as citizens of the uk to be adults and stop trying to be our nannies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we do not need the government to constantly tell us as adults that we are obese/smoking too much/drinking too much. not voting enough making money from speeding tickets in fact generally becoming ever more big brother we want the freedom guaranteed in the constitution of this country to be a free thinking mature adult

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action that makes a point about government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
